definition[0]: to make changes in something such as music or a piece of writing
example[0]: I plan to rework the whole song.
definition[1]: to make changes to something so that it can be used again or is more suitable for a particular use
example[1]: The reworked commercial was much more successful than the original one.
definition[2]: to correct mistakes or faults in something
example[2]: 10% of the engines had to be reworked when they came off the production line.
example[3]: The first-half figures had been reworked.
